### postOffset() {#aaf8f611dfd05f80edc08142e57f94f65}

Compute the offset immediately following this block.

<code>MBB</code> is the next block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp">BranchRelaxation.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Attributes

### Offset {#a8d5047856c504cd549c40b0d2af35c15}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;BranchRelaxation.cpp&#125;::BranchRelaxation::BasicBlockInfo::Offset = 0</>}>
Offset - Distance from the beginning of the function to the beginning of this basic block.

The offset is always aligned as required by the basic block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp">BranchRelaxation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Size {#a125228eb9562ad7be1d5b550ce0ba3c8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;BranchRelaxation.cpp&#125;::BranchRelaxation::BasicBlockInfo::Size = 0</>}>
Size - Size of the basic block in bytes.

If the block contains inline assembly, this is a worst case estimate.

The size does not include any alignment padding whether from the beginning of the block, or from an aligned jump table at the end.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/branchrelaxation-cpp">BranchRelaxation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
